trans-unit.source: Arden Angel
trans-unit.target: Arden Angel

trans-unit.source: Flying At the beginning of your upkeep, if Arden Angel is in your graveyard, roll a four-sided die. If the result is 1, return Arden Angel from your graveyard to the battlefield.
trans-unit.target: Flying At the beginning of your upkeep, if Arden Angel is in your graveyard, roll a four-sided die. If the result is 1, return Arden Angel from your graveyard to the battlefield.

trans-unit.source: Ashuza's Breath
trans-unit.target: Ashuza's Breath

trans-unit.source: For each creature, choose a number from 0 to 2 at random. Ashuza's Breath deals that much damage to that creature.
trans-unit.target: For each creature, choose a number from 0 to 2 at random. Ashuza's Breath deals that much damage to that creature.

trans-unit.source: Camato Scout
trans-unit.target: Camato Scout

trans-unit.source: As Camato Scout enters the battlefield, choose a basic land type at random. Camato Scout has landwalk of the chosen type.
trans-unit.target: As Camato Scout enters the battlefield, choose a basic land type at random. Camato Scout has landwalk of the chosen type.

trans-unit.source: Hapato's Might
trans-unit.target: Hapato's Might

trans-unit.source: Target creature gets +X/+0 until end of turn, where X is a number from 0 to 6 chosen at random.
trans-unit.target: Target creature gets +X/+0 until end of turn, where X is a number from 0 to 6 chosen at random.

trans-unit.source: Lydari Druid
trans-unit.target: Lydari Druid

trans-unit.source: When Lydari Druid enters the battlefield, for each land on the battlefield, choose a basic land type at random. Those lands become the land types chosen this way. (This effect lasts indefinitely.)
trans-unit.target: When Lydari Druid enters the battlefield, for each land on the battlefield, choose a basic land type at random. Those lands become the land types chosen this way. (This effect lasts indefinitely.)

trans-unit.source: Lydari Elephant
trans-unit.target: Lydari Elephant

trans-unit.source: As Lydari Elephant enters the battlefield, choose two numbers from 3 to 7 at random. Lydari Elephant's power is equal to the first number chosen and its toughness equal to the second number chosen.
trans-unit.target: As Lydari Elephant enters the battlefield, choose two numbers from 3 to 7 at random. Lydari Elephant's power is equal to the first number chosen and its toughness equal to the second number chosen.

trans-unit.target: Murgish Cemetery

trans-unit.target: {3}{B}, Discard a card: Create an X/X black Zombie creature token, where X is a number from 2 to 6 chosen at random.

trans-unit.target: Saji's Torrent

trans-unit.source: Tornellan Protector
trans-unit.target: Tornellan Protector

trans-unit.source: {T}: Until end of turn, each time damage is dealt to target creature or player, prevent X of that damage, where X is a number from 1 to 3 chosen at random each time.
trans-unit.target: {T}: Until end of turn, each time damage is dealt to target creature or player, prevent X of that damage, where X is a number from 1 to 3 chosen at random each time.
